EmailTemplate.subject: Doctor Evidence-Sanofi Post Training
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}, find quick-guides to help you navigate DOC Data. You have access to the DRE platforms through Single-Sign-On at https://sanofi.doctorevidence.com.
Please take a moment to browse the DRE publications, which will give you an idea of the breadth of our work and the capabilities of our services: http://drevidence.com/publications/.
Please donâ€™t hesitate to contact us at sanofi.support@doctorevidence.com if you need support in using the system, or would like a one-to-one webinar training on DOC Data, Doctor Evidence's analytic platform.
Sincerely,
Nancy Morgan Vice President, Learning and Development Doctor Evidence 847.507.1451
